It is a small city about 20 km from
. Nearby is the UNESCO World Heritage site that comprises the ruins of Sans Souci palace and the Citadelle Henri Christophe.
Guide Maurice Etienne of the Lakou Lakay cultural centre (Centre Cuturel Lakou Lakay) offers rooms for travellers, for around HTG 1000.
Tap-taps to Cap-Haïtien run along the main street, and cost around HTG 15 (USD .45).
